模块 com.example.demo
程序包 com.example.demo.Actor

类 ActiveActorDestructible

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.example.demo.Actor.ActiveActor
com.example.demo.Actor.ActiveActorDestructible
所有已实现的接口:
Destructible, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
直接已知子类:
AmmoBox, FighterPlane, Heart, Projectile
public abstract class ActiveActorDestructible extends ActiveActor implements Destructible
Abstract class for active actors that are destructible. This class extends ActiveActor and implements Destructible. It adds the functionality of handling hitboxes for collision detection and tracking the destroyed state of the object.

  • 字段详细资料

    • isDestroyed

      private boolean isDestroyed
      A boolean flag that tracks whether the actor has been destroyed. When set to true, the actor is considered to no longer be active or participating in the game world.

    • hitbox

      private javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle hitbox
      The Rectangle representing the collision area of the actor. This hitbox is used to detect interactions with other game elements (e.g., bullets, obstacles) and is updated alongside the actor's position. The hitbox is transparent and is drawn for collision purposes.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • ActiveActorDestructible

      public ActiveActorDestructible(String imageName, double imageWidth, int imageHeight, double initialXPos, double initialYPos)
      Constructs a new destructible active actor.
      参数:
      imageName - The name of the image representing the actor.
      imageWidth - The width of the actor's image.
      imageHeight - The height of the actor's image.
      initialXPos - The initial X position of the actor.
      initialYPos - The initial Y position of the actor.

  • 方法详细资料

    • createAndAddHitbox

      private void createAndAddHitbox(double width, double height)
      Creates and adds the hitbox to the actor. The hitbox is a Rectangle that represents the collision area of the actor. The hitbox is initially transparent.
      参数:
      width - The width of the hitbox.
      height - The height of the hitbox.

    • updateHitbox

      protected void updateHitbox()
      Updates the position of the hitbox based on the actor's current position. This ensures that the hitbox moves along with the actor.

    • setHitboxSize

      public void setHitboxSize(double width, double height)
      Sets the size of the hitbox.
      参数:
      width - The new width of the hitbox.
      height - The new height of the hitbox.

    • getHitbox

      public javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle getHitbox()
      Returns the current hitbox of the actor.
      返回:
      The Rectangle representing the hitbox.

    • updatePosition

      public abstract void updatePosition()
      Abstract method to update the position of the actor. This method must be implemented by subclasses to update the actor's position.
      指定者:
      updatePosition 在类中 ActiveActor

    • updateActor

      public abstract void updateActor()
      Abstract method to update the actor's state or behavior. This method must be implemented by subclasses to define how the actor's behavior is updated.

    • takeDamage

      public abstract void takeDamage()
      Abstract method to apply damage to the actor. This method must be implemented by subclasses to define how the actor reacts to damage.
      指定者:
      takeDamage 在接口中 Destructible

    • destroy

      public void destroy()
      Destroys the actor and sets its destroyed state to true. Once destroyed, the actor is no longer considered active.
      指定者:
      destroy 在接口中 Destructible

    • setDestroyed

      protected void setDestroyed(boolean isDestroyed)
      Sets the destroyed state of the actor.
      参数:
      isDestroyed - The new destroyed state of the actor.

    • isDestroyed

      public boolean isDestroyed()
      Checks if the actor is destroyed.
      返回:
      true if the actor is destroyed, false otherwise.
